backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing access control, user approval, invite-only mode, user profiles, and match history for multiple game modes (Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot, APA Practice, Real APA Match) with CRUD operations and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: adding useCallback to React imports and wrapping handleLiveRackUpdate with useCallback in PracticeGamePage.tsx to prevent infinite render loops.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, authentication, game modes (APA Practice, Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot), match history, stats, and UI components with detailed implementation notes.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation for a UI-only change that reordered ModeCard buttons to display 'Start New Game' above 'Resume Game', with no changes to session storage, navigation logic, or gameplay functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, cards, buttons, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title describing the APA-style pool practice scorekeeper app, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with error boundaries for all routes (home, APA practice, Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot, match history, stats, admin), wrapped with ThemeProvider, AuthGate, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: Table component displaying win/loss performance statistics for each starting ball count level (2-7) in Accepting Gifts mode, with empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Reusable ball button component for APA scoring with four states (unscored, playerA, playerB, dead), hover colors based on active player, locked state support, and accessibility labels.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Provides shared UI helpers for APA 9-Ball rack scoring, including ball value calculation with one-away rule logic and rack total computation ensuring 10 points per rack.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Interactive panel for scoring individual APA 8-ball racks with ball-by-ball tracking, inning flow management, defensive shot counting, and automatic target detection for match completion.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results summary with player statistics including skill levels, points earned, defensive shots, innings, PPI, and team match point outcomes.
frontend/src/components/apa/MatchupAnaly: Dropdown menu component that lists unique opponent names from official APA matches and triggers matchup analysis selection.
Enhanced matchup analysis dropdown with practice match toggle that filters and displays head-to-head match history between a player and selected opponent.
Panel displaying detailed head-to-head statistics and match history between a player and opponent, including both official and practice APA matches with PPI calculations.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form component for creating or editing official APA match records with validation for skill levels, scores, innings, defensive shots, and automatic points-to-win calculation.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: React hook managing innings counter and turn flow for APA 9-Ball matches, incrementing innings when the bottom player completes their turn and preserving state across rack boundaries.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate component that enforces login and checks invite-only mode access control, showing appropriate loading states and access denial pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component that manages Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog component for creating and editing user profiles with name and APA skill level, automatically prompting new users and handling backend connection retries.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Table component displaying match history with multi-select checkboxes, delete functionality, and navigation to match details, showing date, results, PPI, and aPPI metrics.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header navigation, authentication status, admin controls, stats access, and footer, showing connection status when backend is initializing.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: A button component that opens a confirmation dialog to delete a match, using the useDeleteMatch hook and navigating to history or calling a callback after deletion.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: A reusable alert dialog component for confirming match termination with customizable title, description, and confirm text, supporting pending and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a summary card for a match with mode badge, date, and mode-specific details (APA scores, Accepting Gifts status, Straight Shot results), with click navigation to match details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: A card component for game mode selection that displays title, description, icon, and buttons to start new or resume in-progress sessions based on session storage.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Renders line charts for APA performance trends including PPI/aPPI, points scored, and defensive shots over time using unified timestamp-based data points.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Displays a bar chart showing the frequency distribution of shot counts across Straight Shot sessions.
Renders a table summarizing Straight Shot performance by ball count, showing wins, losses, and first win date for each count.
Displays a composed chart with bars and trend line showing shot count over time for Straight Shot sessions, including average calculation.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: QA checklist document for manually verifying Straight Shot game functionality including session start, shot entry, save, and history display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Hook providing a retry mechanism that clears and refetches the cached actor query to recover from connection failures without page refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on matches and user profiles, including approval status management, using the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines a 12-level progression system for Accepting Gifts mode (2-7 object balls Ã— 8-ball/9-ball), with helpers for level management and baseline computation based on win/loss outcomes.
Manages Accepting Gifts game session state and logic, applying attempt results (runout vs miss) and preparing next sets in a race-to-7 format.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts and aggregates per-player APA statistics (PPI, aPPI, points, defensive shots) from practice and official matches, with independent field validation and null handling.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA 9-ball skill level to points-to-win mapping (SL1=14 to SL9=75) with validation and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Implements APA 9-ball match point conversion (20-point system) based on loser's skill level and points pocketed, with threshold tables for each skill level.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA Practice match outcomes by determining the winner based on target scores, then using the loser's skill level and points to calculate match points for both players.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Handles APA 9-ball rack scoring with 10 points per rack, validates rack totals, and calculates PPI (points per inning) statistics for players across multiple racks.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill levels (1-9) based on PPI and aPPI averages using different range tables for official tabs and detailed player stats pages.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaExpected: Provides the official APA expected PPI lookup table organized by win percentage buckets (10-100%) and skill levels (SL2-SL7) for performance comparison.
Derives Official APA match outcomes (win/loss/unknown) by comparing player scores against their skill-level-based target points, with fallback to stored didWin field.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Calculates Official APA PPI (score divided by effective innings) and aPPI (adjusted PPI using expected values from win percentage tables, with special handling for wins vs losses).
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Builds formatted narrative strings for match history rows, displaying mode-specific details (scores, opponents, levels) with win/loss indicators for Official APA, APA Practice, Straight Shots, and Accepting Gifts matches.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Determines the effective match date for sorting and display, preferring user-entered dates for Official APA matches and falling back to system timestamps, with timezone-aware parsing for YYYY-MM-DD format.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Exports buildOfficialApaMatchLog function that creates official APA match records with derived win/loss outcomes based on skill levels and scores, plus re-exports other match builders from the original file.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Contains builder functions for creating match records for APA 9-Ball practice matches, Accepting Gifts drills, and Straight Shot sessions with full player stats, scoring, and outcome computation.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Provides centralized helpers for managing per-mode in-progress session state in sessionStorage with separate slots for APA Practice, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot modes.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Computes Accepting Gifts performance statistics grouped by starting ball count (2-7), tracking wins and losses from completed race-to-7 sets.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Computes summary statistics for Accepting Gifts mode including total sessions and rolling average of ending object ball counts from the last N sessions.
Computes official APA match statistics including win rate, average PPI (last 10 matches), and average aPPI (best 10 of last 20) from chronologically sorted match data.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes comprehensive Straight Shot statistics including rolling/lifetime averages, lowest shot count, trend data, histogram data, and win/loss summary by ball count.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Main game page for the Accepting Gifts drill that manages game state (player/ghost scores, levels, attempts), handles rack attempts, set completion, and saving matches to the backend with session persistence.
Displays the rules and instructions for the Accepting Gifts drill, explaining the 12-level progression system, match format (race to 7), and advancement/demotion logic.
Start page for Accepting Gifts that allows users to select a starting level, displays their baseline level, handles session creation/resumption, and shows collapsible rules.
Live scoring page for APA 9-ball practice matches that tracks rack-by-rack scoring, innings, defensive shots, manages seat-based player positions, and saves completed matches.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Setup page for APA practice matches where users enter player names, skill levels, handle lag selection, and manage session creation/resumption with validation.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Edit page for official APA match logs that loads existing match data by ID and renders the RealApaMatchForm in edit mode with pre-populated fields.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Entry page for logging official APA matches after the fact (not live scoring) that renders the RealApaMatchForm in create mode.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Displays an access-denied page for invite-only apps with a button to request approval from the owner, showing success feedback after submission.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Shows detailed information for a specific match including player stats, mode-specific data (APA/Gifts/Straight), official PPI/aPPI calculations, and options to edit or delete the match.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Displays a filterable and sortable list of all matches with tabs for different game modes (All/APA/Gifts/Straight) and toggleable card/table view modes.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying four mode cards (Official APA Match Log, APA Practice, Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot) with navigation to match history for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin-only page for managing user access approvals with invite-only mode toggle, showing pending/approved/rejected users with bulk reject functionality.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays aggregate APA statistics for a specific player including best-10-of-20 PPI/aPPI averages, predicted skill levels, win rates, and matchup analysis from official matches only.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Deployment verification page with a checklist and quick navigation buttons to test routing to Home and Match History pages.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Main statistics dashboard with tabs for APA, Straight Shot, and Accepting Gifts game modes, showing charts, trends, performance metrics, and opponent matchup analysis for the current user.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Main game page for Straight Shot drill that manages game state (player name, notes, total shots), handles session persistence via sessionStorage, and provides UI for recording shots and ending/saving the session with backend integration.
Displays the rules for the Straight Shot drill in a card component, explaining the objective (clear all balls in 20 shots or fewer), gameplay mechanics, and winning criteria.

Start page for Straight Shot drill that displays player stats (moving average of last 10 sessions), handles session creation/resumption, and shows confirmation dialog when overwriting an in-progress session.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Utility function that extracts readable error messages from various error types (strings, Error objects, nested objects) with fallback to generic error message.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Utility functions for normalizing and comparing player names case-insensitively, including checking if a name matches any in a list.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds URL-encoded route paths for player aggregate stats pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Comprehensive URL parameter utilities for extracting query params from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a Promise with a timeout that rejects if the promise doesn't resolve within the specified time limit.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions for colors (using OKLCH), typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural notes about fixing React #185 infinite render loop by wrapping handleLiveRackUpdate with useCallback in PracticeGamePage.tsx.
